ch0246_80_beet/0101_0701_01_10:
I see you showed up again today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m impressed.
ch0246_80_beet/0101_0701_02_10:
If you take too much time off from training,
you’ll get rusty, so there’s no time to
dawdle.
ch0246_80_beet/7101_0701_01_10: We seem to run into each other often.
ch0246_80_beet/7101_0701_02_10:
Please don’t tell me that old gran told you
to watch over me, to reach new heights of
pink...or whatever.
ch0246_80_beet/7101_0701_03_10: Oh, never mind. Must be just a coincidence.
ch0246_80_beet/7102_0701_01_10:
I didn’t think I’d have the chance to wear this
uniform on Pasio.
ch0246_80_beet/7102_0701_02_10:
I wear it to spread the word about how
wonderful Fairy-type Pokémon are.
ch0246_80_beet/7102_0701_03_10:
If you want to learn, I could deign to coach
you, as a special favor.
ch0246_80_beet/7103_0701_01_10:
Rapidash has been with me ever
since Galar.
ch0246_80_beet/7103_0701_02_10: He’s always been by my side.
ch0246_80_beet/7104_0701_01_10:
I am, without doubt, the strongest Fairy-type
user on this island.
ch0246_80_beet/7104_0701_02_10:
No matter what talent may arise,
my superiority will endure.
ch0246_80_beet/7104_0701_03_10: In the end, I will prevail—and win!
ch0246_80_beet/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve never felt uncomfortable around you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0246_80_beet/7105_0701_02_10:
Perhaps it’s because you’re my rival—one
I’m destined to compete against and beat.
ch0246_80_beet/1701_0701_01_10: Think you’ll be able to use this properly?
ch0246_80_beet/1701_0702_01_10:
If not, just treat any mistakes as learning
opportunities.
ch0246_80_beet/2501_0701_01_10:
The Ballonlea Gym uniform suits me well,
don’t you think?
ch0246_80_beet/2501_0701_02_10: It’s an outfit only the chosen elite can wear!
ch0246_80_beet/2501_0701_03_10:
As for you... You still lack the pink to pull off
the look.
ch0246_80_beet/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m sure you want this uniform too,
don’t you.
ch0246_80_beet/2501_0702_02_10:
If so, you should train under me or
Ms. Opal.
ch0246_80_beet/2511_0701_02_10:
I must admit even I, elite as I am, have
made mistakes in the past.
ch0246_80_beet/2511_0702_01_10:
Once you make a mistake, it never
goes away.
ch0246_80_beet/2511_0702_02_10:
However, that’s because every single failure
and success connects to who you are now.
ch0246_80_beet/3001_0701_01_10:
Looking rough because the day’s just begun?
You should take extra care to be
presentable!
ch0246_80_beet/3003_0701_01_10:
Did you need me for something? Please
keep it short—Ms. Opal’s calling for me.
ch0246_80_beet/3005_0701_01_10:
How was your day? Learn from today’s
mistakes so you don’t repeat them tomorrow.
